Posts.Content:
Hello, sorry I haven't posted lately but I have been to the doctors about
 everyday since Friday, which was first ongologist visit.  Dr. said that I need to have chemo asap, because I have a fast growing cancer.  He send me to have alot of test this week from node biopsy to PET scan. He called and left a message saying that my scan came back abnormal, with a suspicious spot on my back.  Now I have to go back to the hospital tommorrow for a ct scan, ultrasound, and possible biopsy of my back.  I have had a lump in the upper left side for years, I was always told it was because I have scholiosis (sorry if I spelled it wrong).  Basically they are putting me in the stage IV range. Has anyone else out there been in this predictament? If so any information would be greatfull.
Posts.Title: PET Scan abnormal
